import azureml.core

from azureml.core import Experiment, Workspace, Dataset, Datastore
from azureml.train.automl import AutoMLConfig

subscription_id = "051ddeca-1ed6-4d8b-ba6f-1ff561e5f3b3"
resource_group = "chaxu-test"
workspace_name = "chaxuamleus"
experiment_name = "nyc_taxi_automl_run2"

ws = Workspace(subscription_id = subscription_id, resource_group = resource_group, workspace_name = workspace_name)
experiment = Experiment(ws, experiment_name)

df = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM default.nyc_tlc")

datastore = Datastore.get_default(ws)
dataset = register_spark_dataframe(df, datastore, name = experiment_name + "-dataset")
dataset_train, dataset_test = dataset.random_split(percentage = 0.8)

automl_config = AutoMLConfig(spark_context = sc,
                             task = "regression",
                             training_data = dataset_train,
                             label_column_name = "tipAmount",
                             primary_metric = "spearman_correlation",
                             experiment_timeout_hours = 1,
                             max_concurrent_iterations = 2,
                             enable_onnx_compatible_models = True)
displayHTML("Your experiment in Azure Machine Learning portal: {}".format(run.get_portal_url(), run.id))
